name: Drag & Drop
description: Determines if the Framework enables Drag and Drop of elements by default

values.name: Yes
values.description: Supports Drag & Drop by default

values.name: Manually
values.description: While it is possible to add label on lines, it has to be done manually/programmatically

name: Straight Line
description: Determines if the Framework is able to draw a straight line

values.name: Yes
values.description: Supports straight lines out of the box

values.name: Manually
values.description: While it is possible to draw straight lines, it has to be done manually/programmatically

name: Label On Line
description: Determines if the Framework enables labels on lines by default

values.name: Yes
values.description: Supports labels on lines out of the box

values.name: Manually
values.description: While it is possible to add label on lines, it has to be done manually/programmatically

name: Arrow Heads
description: Determines if the Framework enables arrow heads by default

values.name: Yes
values.description: Supports arrow heads out of the box

values.name: Manually
values.description: While it is possible to draw arrow heads, it has to be done manually/programmatically

name: Angular2 support
description: Shows if there is Angular2 support (d.ts file)

values.name: Yes
values.description: There is native Angular2 support

values.name: No
values.description: There is no native Angular2 support. You either has to search for a d.ts file or write it yourself

name: Scaling
description: Determines if the framework supports Scaling of elements by default

values.name: Yes
values.description: Supports Scaling out of the box

values.name: Manually
values.description: There is no scaling support, it has to be done manually/programmatically

name: Rendering Method
description: The Rendering Method of the Framework

values.name: SVG
values.description: Uses SVG as Rendering Method

values.name: Canvas
values.description: Uses Canvas as Rendering Method

values.name: HTML
values.description: Manipulates the DOM as a Rendering Method

values.name: Yes
values.description: Supports different edge types

values.name: No
values.description: No support of different edge types

name: Explicit Data Model
description: Framework has an explicit data model to create graphs

values.name: Yes
values.description: Supports Explicit Data Model

values.name: No
values.description: No support for explicit Data Model

values.name: Partially
values.description: Partial support for an explicit Data Model (e.g. part of a commerical license)

name: Docking Points
description: Framework supports Docking Points for Elements out of the box

values.name: Yes
values.description: Supports Docking Points

values.name: No
values.description: No support for Docking Points

name: Connection Types
description: Framework supports different type of connection types

values.name: Orthogonal
values.description: Support for Orthogonal Connection Type

values.name: Other
values.description: Supports Different Connection Type (e.g. free form)

values.name: Fast
values.description: Framework is fast when drawing 50 x 50 fully interconnected graph

values.name: Slow
values.description: Framework is slow when drawing 50 x 50 fully interconnected graph
